card.desc:
Steps to reproduce :

1. Open To-Do list application
2. Locate the placeholder text inside the input field

Expected Result :
The placeholder text should be grammatically correct. It should display " What needs to be done ?  "

Actual Result :
The placeholder text displays :
" What need's to be done ? "
card.name: Incorrect Grammar in Placeholder text

card.name: Task Formatting -> Inconsistent Space Display Between View & Edit Modes
Task Formatting -> Inconsistent Space Display Between View & Edit Modes

card.desc:
Steps to reproduce  :

1. Create a new task with the title : " tarek , roshdy. abbas (including multiple spaces )
2. Save the task and observe how it is displayed in the list
3. Edit the task and check how the title appears in the input field

Expected Result :
The task title should displays the same spacing in both view & edit modes

Actual Result :
In view mode , only a single space appears between each word , but in the edit mode , the original spacing is preserved
card.name: Task Formatting -> Inconsistent Space Display Between View & Edit Modes
Task title displays incorrect spacing when viewed ( Spaces are collapsed)
